{"id":833764441,"question_id":777,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 year, 11 months","timestamp":1667190020,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"37 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/833764441/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Toeplitz Matrix","memory":"17.4 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    bool isToeplitzMatrix(vector<vector<int>>& matrix) {\n        \n        for (int r = 0; r < matrix.size(); ++r)\n            for (int c = 0; c < matrix[0].size(); ++c)\n                if (r > 0 && c > 0 && matrix[r-1][c-1] != matrix[r][c])\n                    return false;\n        return true;\n        \n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"toeplitz-matrix","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
